授業目的:
This course focuses on the global aspect of entrepreneurship with students of IMC  in a practical way.All students from a different background can collaborate on projects to find out tasks, create business ideas with human-centered design thinking, build global teamwork, and practice effective solutions as a global leader for a better society. 

The instructors provide frameworks, class discussion and workshops for creating innovative ideas, business strategy, marketing analysis, financial statements solving global complex issues. Students can have opportunities to launch new business such as international business or Japan’s specialized business in their countries or Japan. This experience enriches how to improve YOUR skill of creating new business not only as an entrepreneur but also as a project manager for a company. Making a business plan and prototype will be required for a final presentation.
到達目標:
Students completing this course will be able to 
-have entrepreneurial mindset and behavior 
-create and implement a new business plan
-pitch in business contests
-led international members to start up new business
